mapper.select: SELECT sido_name, gugun_name, dong_name, apt_seq, apt_nm, jibun, latitude, longitude FROM houseinfos join dongcodes ON (umd_nm = dong_name) WHERE dong_code like #{dongCode};

select d.sido_name, d.gugun_name, d.dong_name, h.apt_seq, h.apt_nm, h.jibun, h.latitude, h.longitude from dongcodes d join houseinfos h on(d.dong_name = h.umd_nm and left(d.dong_code,5) = h.sgg_cd) limit 0 , 30

select d.sido_name, d.gugun_name, d.dong_name, h.apt_seq, h.apt_nm,h.jibun, h.latitude, h.longitude from dongcodes d join houseinfos h on(d.dong_name = h.umd_nm and left(d.dong_code,5) = h.sgg_cd) where sido_name = #{pSido}

select d.sido_name, d.gugun_name, d.dong_name, h.apt_seq, h.apt_nm,h.jibun, h.latitude, h.longitude from dongcodes d join houseinfos h on(d.dong_name = h.umd_nm and left(d.dong_code,5) = h.sgg_cd) where sido_name = #{pSido} and gugun_name = #{pGugun}

select d.sido_name, d.gugun_name, d.dong_name, h.apt_seq, h.apt_nm,h.jibun, h.latitude, h.longitude from dongcodes d join houseinfos h on(d.dong_name = h.umd_nm and left(d.dong_code,5) = h.sgg_cd) where sido_name = #{pSido} and gugun_name = #{pGugun} and dong_name = #{pDong}

select d.sido_name, d.gugun_name, d.dong_name, h.apt_seq, h.apt_nm,h.jibun, h.latitude, h.longitude from dongcodes d join houseinfos h on(d.dong_name = h.umd_nm and left(d.dong_code,5) = h.sgg_cd) where apt_seq = #{aptSeq}

select d.sido_name, d.gugun_name, d.dong_name, h.apt_seq, h.apt_nm,h.jibun, h.latitude, h.longitude from dongcodes d join houseinfos h on(d.dong_name = h.umd_nm and left(d.dong_code,5) = h.sgg_cd) where apt_nm like #{PaptName}
